GSD.description:
PCI: endpoint: Fix alignment fault error in copy tests

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.34 by commit bd21b9607bd76529b3cb8bc722f0beaa4aa508ae. For more details please see the references link.
